about_the_game:
Diamond Bundle

7 Epic Items, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, Meta Pass 3 Level Skip, 1000 Metanium, 30 Beam Shards, and more!
Get the Diamond Bundle at an affordable price!
A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss it!

The Diamond Bundle includes:

● Epic Outfit Set: 7 Cropped Training Pieces (Head, Top, Bottom, Shoes, Gloves, Back Gear, Hoverboard)
● Stamp: exclusive stamp to Cropped Outfit
● Emote: exclusive emote to Cropped Outfit
● Meta Pass 3 Level Skip
● 1000 Metanium
● 30 Beam Shards


*Notes
This DLC product is not eligible for duplicate refunds, even if you already own its components, so please be sure to check before purchasing.
